title: Not enough level
body:
Dear developers, i am sorry for posting new champion ideas in help and support, but i can't go other way because my account is below 6 level as i do not play on eu server.
I hope you understand me and could you please do one thing for me? If you can - just copy the text of my new hero discussion and post it in "concepst and ideas" or you can just fully read my discussion and think about adding this and previous hero (aya - keeper of the forest light) yourselves, without creating new post.

replies.body: Although I cannot repost your discussion for you, I'd like to help you be able to post on the boards. Do you have another account over level 6 that you could use to post on the [*Concepts & Creations* boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts)?
